title: Is round 3 risky in kcet counselling?
content: Hey guys should i confirm a seat in round 2 or wait until round 3. Many people say its risky and all. Has anybody gone to round 3 can maybe enlighten or if your friends/relative have done so?

comments.body: What branch and college are you waiting for? Depends on that. Also a backup college and branch should be there so that if you don't get first choice, you should get a proper second choice
Im trying rvitm any course as i couldnt get ece in rvce. I have written no other exams only kcet.

If the colleges above the college which u were allotted in round 2 are those which ur sure about, then it's not a problem at all cause in round 3 cutoffs differ kinda more. So make ur choices wisely,don't gamble,imo gng to round 3 is a must.U never know when u get lucky
im talking about kcet btw
Yeah kcet only
Can u list your college options list?
im tryna get rvitm bro like thats main focus
And rank is 149XX
If you wait for 3rd round you'll prolly get branches like eee or mech in rvitm.
I myself waited till third round for rvce cse but I couldn't get it and instead got pesu cse
This guy knows what he's talking about. As a round 3 student I +1 this

rvitm is different bro

they are rv institution but have higher cutoffs for cse ise and ece + they have same placements as rvce
I think you can wait for ece. I have doubts about the other two.

Wait for 3rd round by holding the 2nd round seat.

You will get better seat or get the seat that you already have in 2nd round.
Are you talking about kcet? I dont think so you can do that??
yea and also bmsce added 1000 seats and many colleges increased their seats i might get ise too.
Yea bro kcet, I did this very thing just last year.
Prolly. Upto you
so if I'm not satisfied with my 3rd round college I can go with the 2nd one??

Yes

If you have chosen to enter the 3rd round by holding the 2nd round seat

ohh damn okay. thanks. 
Will there be any guidelines kinda thing given before the counselling starts?

Yea before every round they will give some guidelines, double check whatever I have said with those guidelines.

My counseling was almost 2 years ago.
oh okay. thank you so much
